thread.title: So, Why Wasn’t Sasha at Obama’s Farewell Address?
thread.title_full: So, Why Wasn’t Sasha at Obama’s Farewell Address?

author: Justin Baragona
title: So, Why Wasn’t Sasha at Obama’s Farewell Address?
text:
So, Why Wasn’t Sasha at Obama’s Farewell Address?   10:40   
So, one of the things people were wondering during President Barack Obama’s farewell address tonight is — where was Sasha? 
Yep, while he paid an emotional tribute to his wife and children from the stage, we only saw Malia sitting with her mom. Now, according to NBC News , Sasha is still enrolled in high school in DC, so it is possible that she had to stay back to make class. Because it is, after all, a school night 
Over on Twitter, folks started asking where she was at: Us trying to figure out where Sasha was: #ObamaFarewell pic.twitter.com/lAc3Oaso89 
— HuffPost BlackVoices (@blackvoices) January 11, 2017 "OMG. Wait. That was TONIGHT?!"– Sasha 
— Sam Sanders (@samsanders) January 11, 2017 Yo where is Sasha 
— Vann R. Newkirk II (@fivefifths) January 11, 2017 where is Sasha tho? was she the designated survivor or something? 
— Wesley Lowery (@WesleyLowery) January 11, 2017 "Sorry, plans."– Sasha
